topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Community Ironic Service Overview

body.p: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Community leverages the OpenStack(R) Ironic service during the installation for provisioning of the controller and KVM compute host in a baremetal deployment.

Ironic is an incubated OpenStack(R) project to provision baremetal, not virtual, machines by leveraging common technologies such as PXE boot and IPMI to cover a wide range of hardware. Supporting pluggable drivers allows vendor-specific functionality to be added.

section.title: For more information
section.p: For information on Ironic, see OpenStack(R) Ironic's developer documentation.
For more information on the HPE Helion OpenStack(R) deployment model, see HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Technical Overview.
